Articles.Content:
900 A Romulus, Big and fast

The 900 A Romulus is a med range, high speed, scout jet, with a top speed clocking out at about 15000 mps and a top range around 25,000 Meters. Also, the radio tower TOTALLY isn't just somewhere to run struts to, it was added at the pilots request for entertainment during long range flights (Note: 98.7 "The Hog" come in a bit iffy around the 24,000 m mark, this is probably due to solar radiation interference.)

http://i1282.photobucket.com/albums/...psd03f6b78.jpg
